name: Alpha/Omega: The Christian RPG
description: Welcome to Alpha/Omega: The Christian RPG! Play through the major events of the Bible, gather a party of angels, animal companions, and followers of the faith as you fight off real-life temptations in spiritual combat and explore a variety of game-inspired dreams.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 600 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
